svg:
<style  type="text/css" media="print>
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Droid Serif';
  font-weight: 400;
  font-style: normal;
  src: url('src/test/resources/com/itextpdf/svg/processors/impl/web-fonts/droid-serif-regular.ttf') format('truetype'),
  url('src/test/resources/com/itextpdf/svg/processors/impl/web-fonts/droid-serif-invalid.ttf') format('opentype');
}

@font-face {
   font-family: 'Droid Serif';
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: normal;
  src: url('src/test/resources/com/itextpdf/svg/processors/impl/web-fonts/droid-serif-bold.ttf') format('opentype');
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Droid Serif';
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: italic;
  src: url('src/test/resources/com/itextpdf/svg/processors/impl/web-fonts/droid-serif-bolditalic.ttf') format('truetype');
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Droid Serif';
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: italic;
  src: url('src/test/resources/com/itextpdf/svg/processors/impl/web-fonts/droid-serif-italic.ttf') format('opentype');
}

 1. Droid Serif Regular
 2. Droid Serif Italic
 3. Droid Serif Bold
 4. Droid Serif Bold Italic
